headline: Cigna (CI): Is the Healthcare Giant Trading Below Its True Value?
summary: Cigna Group (CI) shares have shown a little movement recently. With no major headline driving the action, investors are keeping an eye on how the stock’s valuation lines up with its steady financial performance over the past year. See our latest analysis for Cigna Group. After a strong performance earlier in the year, Cigna Group’s share price has mostly held steady near $301.78, reflecting investor confidence in its financial profile even as the 1-year total shareholder return sits slightly...
